530180.name: Party Hard - Dark Castle
530180.description:
Just imagine an old castle where ancient creatures dwell. Under the full moon they awaken from their deep sleep and start a grim party. Horrific things will happen in neighboring settlements... In the Dark Castle DLC you play as a Helsing-inspired character. You are accompanied by your true friend and a trustful ally—your adorable dog.

What's inside the package:

  • Huge level - the first Party Hard scrolling map
  • New character with unique abilities
  • Brand new traps
  • Local co-op multiplayer
  • Your own pet, a dog!
530180.supported_languages:
英语*, 俄语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 罗马尼亚语, 法语, 乌克兰语, 日语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西
*具有完全音频支持的语言
